practice_phrases.target: I'm going to start speaking English.

practice_phrases.known: 我今天晚上就要和你说话了。
practice_phrases.target: I'm going to speak with you this evening.

practice_phrases.known: 因为我想学习，所以我就要开始了。
practice_phrases.target: Because I want to learn, I'm going to start.

practice_phrases.known: 我猜我很快就要认识会说英语的人了。
practice_phrases.target: I guess I'm going to meet people who speak English soon.

practice_phrases.known: 我就要开始尽可能多地练习说话了。
practice_phrases.target: I'm going to start practising speaking as often as possible.
